greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A004001(A004001(n-1)) AND A004001(n-A004001(n-1)), a(1) = a(2) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = If[n <= 2, 1, a[a[n - 1]] + a[n - a[n - 1]]]; Table[BitAnd[a[#], a[n - #]] &@ a[n - 1] - Boole[n <= 2], {n, 97}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 18 2017, after _Robert G. Wilson v_ at A004001 *)
program: ;; A004198bi implements bitwise-AND (see A004198). Code for A004001 given under that entry.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 18 2017
